Package zork

Class Game

java.lang.Object
zork.Game
public class Game extends Object
This class processes user input and controls the hole game

    • Game

      public Game()

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play​(Player player)
      Main playing method that processes user input, filters possible commands and calls the related methods
      Parameters:
      player - The current player in the game

    • look

      public void look​(String lookingAt)
      Shows information about all ways, things and available items in current room when looking around or shows information about the way for given direction
      Parameters:
      lookingAt - The direction the player is looking at

    • move

      public void move​(String direction)
      Moves in the given direction if it's a valid direction and the way is not blocked
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction the player wants to move

    • take

      public void take​(String itemName)
      Adds item to the players inventory if an item with given name exists in current room and inventory isn't full. If the item is removable it will be removed from current room. Water can not be taken.
      Parameters:
      itemName - from item to take, from user input

    • drop

      public void drop​(String itemName)
      Drops specified item from user Inventory into the current room if that item is in the players inventory. If an item already exists, don't add a new one.
      Parameters:
      itemName - from UserInput.

    • getWayForDirection

      public Way getWayForDirection​(String direction)
      Helper method: Returns the way in the given direction if available (otherwise the way is null)
      Parameters:
      direction - Given direction for looking for ways
      Returns:
      Way if there's a way in the given direction, otherwise return null

    • getCurrentRoom

      public Room getCurrentRoom()
      Helper method: Returns the current room

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom​(String roomName)
      Get room by its name
      Parameters:
      roomName - Name of the room to look for
      Returns:
      Room is found in game, otherwise return null

    • use

      public void use​(String input)
      Method to use items (command "use ")
      Parameters:
      input - Given user input

    • useWith

      public void useWith​(String input)
      Method to implement command use with
      Parameters:
      input - the user input

    • feedWith

      public void feedWith​(String input)
      Method to implement command feed with
      Parameters:
      input - the user input

    • eat

      public void eat​(String input)
      Method to implement command for eat
      Parameters:
      input - The user input

    • drink

      public void drink​(String input)
      Method to implement command drink
      Parameters:
      input - The user input

    • track

      public void track​(String input)
      Method to implement command track
      Parameters:
      input - The user input

    • isProperInput

      private <T> boolean isProperInput​(T input, List<T> properInput)
      Helper method: Checks if a given input is contained in a given list
      Parameters:
      input - Given input that has to be checked if it's in given list
      properInput - List of proper input
      Returns:
      true if input exists in given list

    • hasWays

      private boolean hasWays()
      Helper method: Checks if the current room has ways

    • createInputWithTwoParameters

      private String[] createInputWithTwoParameters​(String input, String command, String connection)
      help-method Method to get two parameters out of user input
      Parameters:
      input - The user input which should be split
      command - The command in the front
      connection - The word between the parameters
      Returns:
      An array of Strings with the two parameters

    • helpWithThing

      private void helpWithThing​(String input)
      Method to print a info for the player. It will tell what he can do with nonItems, Animals or Enemies
      Parameters:
      input - the input of the user

    • reduceHungerAndThirst

      private void reduceHungerAndThirst()
      Reduces hunger by 2 and thirst by 1

    • checkAndProcessPlayersEnergy

      private void checkAndProcessPlayersEnergy()
      Check players health, hunger and thirst level. If hunger or thirst are 0, health will be reduced. If health is 0, the player will die (game over). Warning messages will be displayed.

    • gameOver

      private void gameOver()
      Displays that game is over. Player can choose between loading a saved game or starting a new game.

    • win

      private void win()
      Displays that game is won. Player can choose between quitting the game or starting a new game.
